staff holy cow you did it net neutrality is


staff:

Holy cow. You did it. Net neutrality is official. 

You made your voices heard loud and clear, and your policymakers actually listened to what you had to say. We’re grateful, and we’re thrilled. 

The internet is officially yours. It’s in good hands.
